com.launchdarkly.client

Class TestFeatureStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.launchdarkly.client.InMemoryFeatureStore
      • com.launchdarkly.client.TestFeatureStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FeatureStore, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class TestFeatureStore
extends InMemoryFeatureStore
    A decorated InMemoryFeatureStore which provides functionality to create (or override) "on" or "off" feature flags for all users. Using this store is useful for testing purposes when you want to have runtime support for turning specific features "on" or "off".

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TestFeatureStore() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void turnFeatureOff(java.lang.String key)
      Turns a feature, identified by key, "off" for every user.
      void turnFeatureOn(java.lang.String key)
      Turns a feature, identified by key, "on" for every user.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TestFeatureStore

        public TestFeatureStore()

    • Method Detail

      • turnFeatureOn

        public void turnFeatureOn(java.lang.String key)
        Turns a feature, identified by key, "on" for every user. If the feature rules already exist in the store then it will override it to be "on" for every LDUser. If the feature rule is not currently in the store, it will create one that is "on" for every LDUser.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the feature flag to be "on".

      • turnFeatureOff

        public void turnFeatureOff(java.lang.String key)
        Turns a feature, identified by key, "off" for every user. If the feature rules already exists in the store then it will override it to be "off" for every LDUser. If the feature rule is not currently in the store, it will create one that is "off" for every LDUser.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the feature flag to be "off".
